raw_body: Loving daughter of late Mr. & Mrs. Kulasekara Muhandiram of Rathmalana, loving sister of Lalitha Chandrapala (USA), beloved mother of Radhika Rathnayake (Weerasinghe) (USA), Sudesh Weerasinghe and Sanajaya Weerasinghe, loving mother-in-law of Janaka Rathnayake (Attorney-at-Law), Shiranthi and Thilo, loving grandmother of Hasaranga, Himandri, Shasika, Sithara, Sachin and Chevan, Chandra Weerasinghe (Kulasekara) (Journalist) has passed away at the
